pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gene Orthologs for Model Organisms in a Tidy Data Format // Genomic analysis of model organisms often requires the use of databases based on human data or making comparisons to patient- derived resources. This requires converting genes between human and non-human analogues. The babelgene R package provides predicted gene orthologs/homologs for frequently studied model organisms in an R-friendly tidy/long format. The package integrates orthology assertion predictions sourced from multiple databases as compiled by the HGNC Comparison of Orthology Predictions (HCOP) (Wright et al. 2005 doi:10.1007/s00335-005-0103-2, Eyre et al. 2007 doi:10.1093/bib/bbl030, Seal et al. 2011 doi:10.1093/nar/gkq892).
